entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

Application Description

"The End of Han Dynasty" requer que a versÃ£o do sistema seja iOS 16 e superior e use iPhone 7 ou 7Plus, iPhone 8 ou 8 Plus, iPhone X e superior, iPad Air 2, iPad mini 4, iPad 2017 ou qualquer iPad Pro para jogar. IntroduÃ§Ã£o do jogo "TrÃªs Reinos: Hegemonia no Fim da Dinastia Han" Ã© um jogo SLG baseado em turnos cuidadosamente produzido pelo Longyou Tianxia Studio. Ã‰ baseado principalmente no novo pensamento das pessoas e na nova perspectiva do jogo TrÃªs Reinos para criar um mundo diferente dos TrÃªs Reinos. Com base no retorno Ã  categoria de estratÃ©gia tradicional, ele retrata profundamente as diferenÃ§as regionais entre as cidades dos trÃªs paÃ­ses e as semelhanÃ§as e diferenÃ§as das prÃ³prias capacidades e caracterÃ­sticas de cada comandante militar. Em termos de combate, destaca o encanto de combinar a hora certa, o lugar certo e a implantaÃ§Ã£o de pessoas. Funcionalidades do jogo Um: estilo clÃ¡ssico de bordado com desenho de linha branca, simples e elegante As cabeÃ§as dos personagens adotam o estilo e a cor do bordado em linha branca da clÃ¡ssica histÃ³ria em quadrinhos "Romance dos TrÃªs Reinos". A interface do jogo adota o estilo antigo e o design com charme antigo, autÃªntico estilo chinÃªs. Dois: modo de gestÃ£o governamental simples e fÃ¡cil de usar: Arranjos bÃ¡sicos de assuntos internos, exploraÃ§Ã£o de pessoal, reconhecimento militar e desenvolvimento de tecnologia adotam um modo de gerenciamento de posicionamento para reduzir operaÃ§Ãµes tediosas e repetitivas e permitir que os jogadores se concentrem em outros eventos. No modo de jogo monarca, os jogadores sÃ³ precisam prestar atenÃ§Ã£o Ã  gestÃ£o da capital e do paÃ­s. Outras cidades sÃ£o entregues ao prefeito. Use a polÃ­tica para dar diferentes instruÃ§Ãµes militares e polÃ­ticas para a subcidade. TrÃªs: configuraÃ§Ãµes de conteÃºdo de jogo extremamente ricas: De 184 a 280 DC, mais de 1.300 generais (incluindo generais histÃ³ricos e histÃ³ricos) apareceram em cena. As capacidades bÃ¡sicas de 30 generais sÃ£o divididas e as capacidades dos generais sÃ£o diferenciadas em detalhes. Mais de 300 configuraÃ§Ãµes independentes das caracterÃ­sticas dos generais, totalmente destacar as diferenÃ§as individuais dos generais. Existem mais de 500 itens e cenÃ¡rios de tesouro com evidÃªncias de pesquisa. Uma variedade de classificaÃ§Ãµes Ã© dividida para atender a diferentes preferÃªncias. Quase mais de 60 tipos diferentes de cidades, mais de 200 caracterÃ­sticas urbanas bem documentadas e produtos especiais. Ricos itens de desenvolvimento tÃ©cnico e suporte em todo o sistema de jogo. Reflete a importÃ¢ncia da forÃ§a cientÃ­fica e tecnolÃ³gica. As seis armas bÃ¡sicas e mais de uma dÃºzia de armas especiais constituem um rico sistema de armas. Sistema super rico de cargos oficiais e tÃ­tulos nobres. O sistema de casamento apontado pelo monarca e o sistema de treinamento e heranÃ§a infantil humanizado. VÃ¡rios fenÃ´menos naturais e desastres de eventos simulam o perÃ­odo conturbado dos TrÃªs Reinos. Muitas forÃ§as estrangeiras e bandidos e bandidos precisam de vocÃª para esmagÃ¡-los e eliminÃ¡-los. Uma riqueza de visitas, mercadores, imortais, celebridades, mÃ©dicos, mestres artesÃ£os, espadachins vagam por aÃ­, desencadeando vÃ¡rios eventos funcionais. Quatro: Retorne ao sistema clÃ¡ssico de combate baseado em turnos, com foco na formaÃ§Ã£o estratÃ©gica de tropas A introduÃ§Ã£o do clima, topografia e alturas dos blocos destaca com mais destaque a influÃªncia dos fatores de tempo e localizaÃ§Ã£o na guerra. entry.title: Solar Arc: Sun and Moon Widget
entry.id: Solar Arc: Sun and Moon Widget-pt-1768416196848
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š3,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 2,99Â â‚¬ [2,99Â â‚¬ ~ 5,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š2,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

Plan sun and moon positions before you arrive. Predict golden hour, moonrise, and light directionâ€”plus widgets that keep key times visible at a glance. Know where the light will beâ€”before you go. Solar Arc is a sun and moon planning tool built for people who care about timing, direction, and alignment. Instead of guessing or arriving too late, you can predict exactly how light will move across a locationâ€”hours or days in advance. Whether youâ€™re scouting, planning a shoot, or timing a sunset or moonrise, Solar Arc gives you clarity before you commit. -- Plan with Precision â€¢ Live Sun & Moon Arc Visualization See real-time solar and lunar paths with compass-based direction. â€¢ Golden Hour & Blue Hour Forecasts Know the precise windows when light is at its best. â€¢ Moonrise & Moonset Planning Track lunar timing and position for night and landscape work. â€¢ Forecasting & Location Planning Preview sun and moon paths for any date, anywhere. â€¢ Offline Access All core planning tools work without a connection in the field.

Application Description

JÃ¡ imaginou como Ã© estar na linha da frente da seguranÃ§a nacional? Em Black Border 2, vocÃª assume o papel de um agente da PolÃ­cia de Fronteira, enfrentando situaÃ§Ãµes desafiantes a cada turno. Com visuais detalhados e jogabilidade envolvente, este jogo oferece uma experiÃªncia realista incomparÃ¡vel que coloca vocÃª no centro da aÃ§Ã£o. Assuma a responsabilidade de proteger as fronteiras do seu paÃ­s contra o contrabando ilegal. Inspecione veÃ­culos, reveja documentos e enfrente contrabandistas que tentam traficar drogas, armas e outras mercadorias ilegais. Cada dia traz novos desafios, onde pensamento rÃ¡pido e visÃ£o aguÃ§ada sÃ£o as suas melhores ferramentas. VocÃª Ã© mais do que um simples agente de fronteira â€” vocÃª Ã© a Ãºltima linha de defesa. Funcionalidades de Black Border 2: SimulaÃ§Ã£o autÃªntica de patrulha de fronteira: Coloque-se no papel de um verdadeiro agente, onde cada decisÃ£o conta e cada interaÃ§Ã£o estÃ¡ carregada de tensÃ£o. InspeÃ§Ã£o detalhada de documentos: Analise cuidadosamente passaportes, autorizaÃ§Ãµes e outros documentos para decidir quem pode entrar e quem deve ser barrado. DeteÃ§Ã£o de contrabando: Realize buscas minuciosas em veÃ­culos e inspeÃ§Ãµes pessoais para capturar criminosos que tentam contrabandear mercadorias ilegais. Personagens dinÃ¢micos com IA: Interaja com personagens realistas que reagem e se adaptam com base nas suas decisÃµes e aÃ§Ãµes. Desafios crescentes: Desde pequenos erros em documentos atÃ© grandes redes de contrabando, enfrente missÃµes cada vez mais intensas que vÃ£o testar os seus limites.

Application Description

Explore a Tabela PeriÃ³dica como nunca antes com o nosso inovador aplicativo 3D! Mergulhe no fascinante mundo dos elementos de uma forma totalmente nova e visualmente impressionante. Nosso aplicativo oferece uma experiÃªncia minimalista e envolvente que transforma a exploraÃ§Ã£o da Tabela PeriÃ³dica em uma jornada Ãºnica e emocionante. Com nossa interface intuitiva e design minimalista, vocÃª pode navegar facilmente pelos elementos. Cada elemento ganha vida em um envolvente ambiente 3D, permitindo que vocÃª visualize sua estrutura de uma maneira que nunca experimentou antes. Observe como os elementos interagem entre si e descubra suas propriedades de uma maneira totalmente nova. Quer saber mais sobre um elemento especÃ­fico? Nosso aplicativo fornece informaÃ§Ãµes detalhadas e de fÃ¡cil compreensÃ£o sobre cada elemento, desde suas propriedades fÃ­sicas e quÃ­micas atÃ© sua histÃ³ria e usos prÃ¡ticos. entry.title: FoodyLife: The Food Diary App
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š1,99Â â‚¬ â†’ Gratuito [Gratuito ~ 1,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šGratuito

Application Description

You will be able to explore your eating habits visually and improve your eating habits. No calories and no numbers are shown in the app! Features: + Beautifully minimalist food diary app + In-App Camera And Filter + No calories No Pressure + Visualizes all your diets and shows your diet balance clearly! + Crazy and Interactive Foody Face + Learn how to eat mindfully and correctly right now! Donâ€™t make Foody Face angry! Tap download right now! ---------- The inspiration behind FoodyLife is that nowadays people pay little attention to what they eat and often eat unhealthy food. Although there are many similar apps on the market (e.g. Fitness App, Calorie counter...), most of them focus mainly on â€œnumbersâ€, such as how many calories the user has eaten and how long the user should exercise to get rid of those calories, or sending the user notifications when they should get up to exercise or if they have eaten too much. FoodyLifeâ€™ is an app that helps users track their daily diet by allowing them to keep their own food diary. The app shows neither calories nor numbers; instead, users have only to take a picture, enter their diet information, then they are able their overall diet balance. It is very simple and highly effective. Users can explore their eating habits visually, improving self-consciousness about eating habits.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Afterplace
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š7,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 0,99Â â‚¬ [0,99Â â‚¬ ~ 7,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š0,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

An open world adventure game filled with silly characters and terrible secrets. Afterplace is an adventurous indie game for mobile devices. It's a huge open world, full of hidden secrets, treasures, and creatures. You'll run around the woods, fight monsters, and talk to ostensibly shady characters! All from your pocket! Be warned though - you never know what the forest might be hiding, and not all trails are paved. Labyrinths and dungeons are tucked away in the most concealed nooks. There are no waypoints in Afterplace. You'll have to forge your own path. Afterplace has been designed from the ground up to be a fast, fluid, beautiful experience for mobile. There are no virtual buttons. You can move and attack by touching anywhere. You can tap objects directly to interact or attack, use two thumbs like a traditional controller, or control the game with a physical gamepad. The game will adapt dynamically to your play style. Pick up and set down the game at your own pace, it will always save your progress. Afterplace is made to feel like a full-fledged indie adventure game that fits in your pocket. About the Author: Afterplace is made by one person, Evan Kice. A former software engineer from Austin TX, Evan quit his job (to the dismay of his friends and family) and has been working full time on Afterplace since early 2019. The initial game released in December of 2022, but Evan plans on continuing to support and polish the game when he can!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP! Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs! Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge? â–¶Features: â— Build your Monster Collection â€¢ Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters! â€¢ Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential. â€¢ Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power! â— Form a Battle Strategy â€¢ Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters. â€¢ Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles! â€¢ Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities. â— Become the Champion â€¢ Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure! â€¢ Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey. â€¢ Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncleâ€™s atrocity. â— Take the Battle Online â€¢ Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues! â€¢ Complete 100+ online missions. â€¢ Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards. Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NeoMonstersOfficial/ Join the Neo Monsters community: http://www.neomonstersforum.com/ Issues or questions?
